question: 事項
sourceMnemonic: An <kanji>action</kanji> <kanji>paragraph</kanji> is a paragraph that shows the <vocabulary>matter</vocabulary> or the <vocabulary>items</vocabulary> or the <vocabulary>facts</vocabulary>. Sort of the action items, you know?
